product.title: Mocha and Tofu Panda Bear Cuddle Love Lunch Bags
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Show your love with every bite! 

    Mocha and Tofu are two adorable bears who love to cuddle. They always pack their lunch bags with bamboo shoots and honey and share them with each other. They show their affection by rubbing their noses, holding their paws, and giving each other sweet kisses. With this snuggly carry-all lunch bag, you'll be able to pack your lunch all in one place.

    Lined with aluminum foil, this lunch bag can keep your food cold or warm for several hours. Additionally, it features an outer pocket that can hold items such as tissues and thin objects.

    Bag measures: 26 x 11 x 21cm10x4x8in / 26x11x21cm


    Benefits of lunch bags:
    🥪 Food Safety: Maintains perishable food temperature for safety.
    🥪 Cost-Effective: Saves money by preparing homemade meals.
    🥪 Healthier Choices: Enables control over ingredients and portions.
    🥪 Environmental Sustainability: Reduces single-use plastic waste.
    🥪 Convenience: Portable and organized for easy transport.
    🥪 Time-Saving: Ready-to-eat lunch without waiting or traveling.
    🥪 Portion Control: Encourages mindful eating and portion sizes.

    Find more kawaii lunch bags at www.kawaiies.com!

    Light and cute bag for both children and adults 

    Surprise your family and friends with our Lunch bag and make lasting impressions. Our Lunch bag is sure to bring joy and become a staple in their everyday lives.


    Step 1: Use the gentlest cycle available on your washing machine.

  • Step 2: Wash our bag in cold water using mild detergent.

    Step 3: If disinfecting is a concern, use warm water or consider using a product like Lysol Laundry Sanitizer, which is safe on both whites and colors, unlike chlorine bleach.

    Step 4: Place the bag in a launderable mesh bag or duvet cover. Padding the drum of the washer with towels can also add another layer of protection. Recommended!

    Step 5: Air-drying will be the gentlest choice, and a hairdryer turned on low heat can help to fluff up the fur once the bag has reached the just-damp stage (think of it as a finishing touch!)

  • Free Tracked Shipping to the United States, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, France, Netherlands, and many more.

    Small shipping fee to Canada, Italy, Switzerland, Norway, Sweden, Denmark, Ireland, Finland, United Arab Emirates, and a few other countries.

    Packaging time: Est. 1-4 Business days
    Shipping time: Est. 5-15 Business days

    For more details and the latest shipping updates please click here: Shipping Policy.
